hypothesis.notes: The page features a detailed product description for a specific model of the Apple Mac mini, including pricing, specifications, and options for configuration. It also includes promotional offers and warranty information.

price.financing_option: 4 interest-free payments or as low as $38 /mo with Affirm

specifications.chip: Apple M1 chip with 8-core CPU, 8-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine

memory.onboard_memory_note: This Mac mini already has all the memory you need built-in. It’s one upgrade this machine will never need.

storage.drive_type_note: This machine comes with a 512GB Apple OEM/Factory Solid-State Drive. This SSD brings some serious horsepower to the track. With SSDs operating dramatically faster than hard drives, you will love the performance gains of having this SSD.

specifications.operating_system_support: Supports macOS 11.0 Big Sur* and later including the latest macOS 26.x Tahoe
specifications.networking: Gigabit Ethernet, Wi-Fi, and Bluetooth Networking (one RJ-45 port that supports 10/100/1000BASE-T networks, also has a Bluetooth 5.0 and 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi card installed)

warranty.special_offer: FREE 1 Year OWC Eclipse Warranty! For a limited time – add a qualifying Mac to your shopping cart, then select FREE 1 Year OWC Eclipse Warranty. Extended options are also available at reduced pricing.
warranty.eclipse_warranty_details: With over 30 years of service and support, millions of computer users have come to trust OWC’s award-winning USA-based support team to get them through any issue. That dedication and love for the computing community is why an OWC Eclipse Warranty is the standard to ensure your Mac is covered above and beyond the basic hardware warranty should an issue arise. OWC Eclipse is only available for orders shipping within the USA.

includes: Supports up to macOS 26.x Tahoe (Current Version)
notes: OWC recommends using a wired keyboard for the initial OS setup, as Bluetooth keyboards sometimes fail to pair until the initial OS setup is complete

OWC individually inspects and fully tests every pre-owned computer to confirm full functionality and accurate grading. All refurbishments and/or upgrades are performed by our Apple Certified Technicians. That's why OWC is the most trusted name in Mac refurbishments.
Warranted and backed by OWC's US-based support team

special_offers.item: Parallels Desktop Pro Edition - Windows/Multi OS Compatibility software for Mac
special_offers.link_text: Must purchase with Parallels Desktop for Mac Pro Edition - 1 Year Subscription
Must purchase with Apple 27" 5K Studio Display with Standard Glass and Tilt Adjustable Stand

special_offers.limit: Limit 3 dock rebates per order (1 dock rebate per qualifying Mac purchase)
special_offers.link_text: Must purchase with OWC 14-Port Thunderbolt Dock with Power = 1 Cable to do all

validation.notes: All expected fields were extracted and formatted correctly.

insights.executive_summary: The extraction successfully captured detailed information about a single Apple Mac mini product from MacSales.com, including pricing, condition, specifications, and warranty options. This data is crucial for potential buyers looking for comprehensive product details and options.
insights.key_findings: The product is offered at a significantly reduced price from its original, with options for financing. It is available in different conditions and storage capacities, with a notable emphasis on the performance benefits of its SSD. The warranty options provide added value, especially with the promotional free 1-year OWC Eclipse Warranty.
insights.recommendation: Consider highlighting the promotional warranty offer in marketing materials to attract more customers. Additionally, monitor stock levels closely due to limited availability.

statistics.key_metrics: Price range: $419.00 - $1,099.00, Condition: Used (Very Good, Excellent), Storage options: 500GB, 512GB, 1TB, Warranty: 90 Day OWC, Free 1 Year OWC Eclipse
